description: Victoria Stroop Task - Color-word interference test

parameters.name: rounds
parameters.description: Number of times to go through all three forms (1-2-3). Each round contains color naming, word reading, and interference conditions.

parameters.name: numcolumns
parameters.description: Number of columns in the stimulus display grid. Standard Victoria format uses 6 columns.

parameters.name: numrows
parameters.description: Number of rows in the stimulus display grid. Standard Victoria format uses 4 rows.

parameters.name: timelimit
parameters.description: Time limit per trial in milliseconds. Set to 0 for no time limit (self-paced).
